eu.amidst.core.exponentialfamily

Class EF_BayesianNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.exponentialfamily.EF_Distribution
      • eu.amidst.core.exponentialfamily.EF_BayesianNetwork

  • public class EF_BayesianNetwork
extends EF_Distribution
    This class extends the abstract class EF_Distribution and defines a BayesianNetwork as a conjugate exponential family (EF) model, consisting of EF distributions in canonical form.

    For further details about how exponential family models are considered in this toolbox look at the following paper: Representation, Inference and Learning of Bayesian Networks as Conjugate Exponential Family Models. Technical Report. (pdf)

      • equal_efBN

        public boolean equal_efBN(EF_BayesianNetwork ef_bayesianNetwork,
                          double threshold)
        Tests whether a given EF_BayesianNetwork model is equal to this EF_BayesianNetwork model.
        Parameters:
        ef_bayesianNetwork - a given input EF_BayesianNetwork object.
        threshold - a double value that represents the threshold or maximum allowed difference.
        Returns:
